text: Futureworld is a 1976 American science fiction thriller movie directed by Richard T. Heffron and stars Peter Fonda, Blythe Danner, Arthur Hill, Stuart Margolin, John Ryan, Yul Brynner. It is a sequel to the 1973 movie Westworld and is the second movie in the Westworld franchise. It was distributed by American International Pictures. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1976 science fiction movies Category:1976 thriller movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Richard T. Heffron
title: Futureworld
